statements: SELECT * FROM stock_prices LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, high, low FROM stock_prices ORDER BY high DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, high - low AS price_range FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE high > 150 AND low < 100 ORDER BY close_price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC, date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol, MIN(open_price) AS min_open_price, MAX(close_price) AS max_close_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, closing_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_companies WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT opening_price, closing_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_companies WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(opening_price) AS avg_opening_price, AVG(closing_price) AS avg_closing_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices JOIN stock_companies ON historical_stock_prices.stock_symbol = stock_companies.stock_symbol WHERE stock_companies.industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1
SELECT stock_id, date, close_price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol_name FROM stock_symbols WHERE symbol_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT investor_name, investor_type FROM stock_investors ORDER BY investor_name
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1 AND date = '2021-01-01'
SELECT close_price, open_price, high_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT investor_name, investor_type FROM stock_investors WHERE investor_type = 'individual' AND investor_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT symbol_name, date, close_price FROM stock_prices INNER JOIN stock_symbols ON stock_prices.stock_id = stock_symbols.symbol_id WHERE symbol_name LIKE 'AAPL%'
SELECT AVG(high_price), MAX(low_price), MIN(open_price) FROM stock_prices GROUP BY date HAVING date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, closing_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE closing_price > 100;
SELECT company_name, sector FROM stock_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT exchange_name, country FROM stock_exchange WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT stock_symbol, analysis_date, analyst, rating FROM stock_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT company_name, sector FROM stock_companies WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT exchange_name FROM stock_exchange WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT analysis_date, analyst, rating FROM stock_analysis WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, opening_price, closing_price, high_price, low_price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices;
SELECT stock_id, date, close_price FROM StockPrices WHERE open_price > 100;
SELECT symbol, stock_name FROM StockSymbols WHERE symbol_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT company_name, industry FROM StockCompanies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT analyst_name, rating FROM StockAnalysts ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_name, symbol FROM StockSymbols WHERE symbol_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND stock_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY stock_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM StockCompanies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT exchange_name, country FROM StockExchange WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY exchange_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT analyst_name, rating FROM StockAnalysts WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC, analyst_name ASC LIMIT 3;
